CustomField.description: The priority of the role when processing permissions. A higher prioritized role is processed before a lower prioritized role. In case of conflicting assignments, the higher priority permission takes precedence.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The priority of the role when processing permissions. A higher prioritized role is processed before a lower prioritized role. In case of conflicting assignments, the higher priority permission takes precedence.
CustomField.label: Priority
